sentences.en: It is clearly to sec that sway motion is increased with the increasing of the length of hawser.
sentences.cn: 计算结果表明，随着系缆索的长度的增加，油船的摇艏运动明显增大。

sentences.en: The fingers were pinched under a hawser.
sentences.cn: 手指被夹在了大缆绳下面.

sentences.en: The hawser can either be thick , heavy ropes or a thin steel cable use on ships.
sentences.cn: 缆绳既可以指粗重的绳子,也可以指船上使用的细钢索.

sentences.en: There's a new hawser faked down there.
sentences.cn: 有条新铁索盘卷在那里.

trans.tran_cn: （供系船或下锚用的）缆索，锚链
trans.tran_en: A hawser is a large heavy rope, especially one used on a ship
